events.name: Decarbonizing Electricity Production via Solar, Wind, and Lithium Supply
events.wd_label: Decarbonizing Electricity Production via Solar, Wind, and Lithium Supply
events.wd_description: As electricity production decarbonizes via the deployment of solar, wind environment. The industry goal in the 2010s was to meet Chinese demand, not to have low CO2 intensity lithium supply.
events.description: As electricity production decarbonizes via the deployment of solar, wind environment. The industry goal in the 2010s was to meet Chinese demand, not to have low CO2 intensity lithium supply.

events.name: Australian spodumene-Chinese conversion LiOH•H2O supply chain
events.wd_label: Australian spodumene-Chinese conversion LiOH•H2O supply chain
events.wd_description: This "lithium rush" has moved the world's lithium production center of gravity to China, where the hard rock resources predominantly come from Australia.
events.description: This "lithium rush" has moved the world's lithium production center of gravity to China, where the hard rock resources predominantly come from Australia.

events.name: Developing an LCA Model for Lithium Products
events.wd_label: Developing an LCA Model for Lithium Products
events.wd_description: We developed an LCA model and data structure tailored specially for the lithium industry in collaboration with Robert Pell at Minviro.

events.name: Using Bacteria for Retrieving Precious Metals in Lithium-Ion Recycling
events.wd_label: Using Bacteria for Retrieving Precious Metals in Lithium-Ion Recycling
events.wd_description: The bioleaching technique uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow and are easily susceptible to contamination.

events.name: lithium supply chain
events.wd_description: The supply chain for lithium, a key material in EV batteries, involves various processes and has significant environmental impacts.
events.description: The supply chain for lithium, a key material in EV batteries, involves various processes and has significant environmental impacts.

events.name: hium extraction
events.wd_description: Lithium extraction involves both brine and hard rock mining, with each method having different environmental impacts.
events.description: Lithium extraction involves both brine and hard rock mining, with each method having different environmental impacts.

events.name: hium processing
events.wd_description: The processing of lithium into battery-grade materials involves various chemical and mechanical processes.
events.description: The processing of lithium into battery-grade materials involves various chemical and mechanical processes.

events.name: hium hydroxide production
events.wd_description: Lithium hydroxide is produced through different methods compared to lithium carbonate, and it is crucial for high-nickel cathode materials.
events.description: Lithium hydroxide is produced through different methods compared to lithium carbonate, and it is crucial for high-nickel cathode materials.

events.name: act assessment
events.wd_description: Life cycle assessments (LCA) are used to evaluate the environmental impacts of different lithium extraction and processing methods.
